GR13stkal_iu:66: ayane savyāsavye dvau puṭakau yugmato viṣuvadāhuḥ Stk_10.23/a
GR13stkal_iu:106: ākrānto vāyurekaḥ sa jananamaraṇaiḥ krīḍati bhrāntasattvaiḥ Stk_10.14d
GR13stkal_iu:143: iti khalu pudgalacāro nāḍīsadhānamaṇḍalaṃ mukhyam Stk_10.28/b
GR13stkal_iu:149: ityetadvāyuvṛndaṃ hṛdi ca vinihitaṃ nābhicakrapratiṣṭhitam Stk_10.14a
GR13stkal_iu:186: uparicarī khalu śaktistāsāṃ prāgbhāvinī śivasya tataḥ Stk_10.19/a
GR13stkal_iu:291: kena vā nīyate tu saḥ Stk_23.12d
GR13stkal_iu:443: tejasvī ca bubhukṣā pīḍā vā jāyate 'gnidikpatre Stk_10.25/b
GR13stkal_iu:466: daśa sapta ca ye śodhyāḥ Stk_8.14c
GR13stkal_iu:507: dhanyo 'bhiṣeka induḥ sauraḥ khalu vahnisaṃdhāne Stk_10.24/b
GR13stkal_iu:512: dhyānādyo viṣuvati ca prāgdalasaṃstho nṛpāvalepī syāt Stk_10.25/a
GR13stkal_iu:552: nityaṃ nityālpajanmā vyasanayati paśuṃ yauvane bālabhāve Stk_10.14c
GR13stkal_iu:713: phaṭ phaṭ phaṭ phaṭ phaḍevaṃ syād Stk_21.21c
GR13stkal_iu:841: yāmye yāmyo bhāvo nairṛtye nairṛto vinirdiṣṭaḥ Stk_10.26/a
GR13stkal_iu:849: yāṃ yāṃ diśamabhigacchati tadbhāvaṃ nikhilamāyāti Stk_10.27/b
GR13stkal_iu:919: vāruṇapatre vāruṇo mārutpatre gato marudbhāvam Stk_10.26/b
GR13stkal_iu:933: vidyā nāma kalā sā tu Stk_13.3c
GR13stkal_iu:1129: saṃyāti yatra neyaḥ śuṣkadalaṃ māruteneva Stk_10.20/b
GR13stkal_iu:1165: saumye saumyo bhāvastvaiśe tvaiśaḥ samākhyātaḥ Stk_10.27/a
GR13stkal_iu:1198: huṃ phaṭ huṃ phaṭ tathaiva ca Stk_21.21b
GR13stkal_iu:1219: hṛdvyomamadhye paṅkajamaṣṭadalaṃ karṇikā ca tasyāntaḥ Stk_10.18/a
